video_prompt: Pastel train moves left-to-right, subtly ascending. Colorful flowers visible inside windows. Multi-colored smoke billows from smokestack, extending upwards. Teal and purple mist swirls around wheels.
image_prompt: A pastel, purple and blue train, filled with pink, purple, and blue flowers, travels left to right on a track, ascending towards the viewer. Multi-colored smoke (purple, blue, teal, orange-pink) billows from the smokestack and swirls around the wheels. Light blue sky, reflective ground. Stylized "c29" in white, bottom right. Dreamlike, whimsical, peaceful, joyful.
refined_video_prompt: A train glides left-to-right, subtly ascending. Inside its windows, flower hues visibly undulate and shift. Multi-colored smoke billows from the smokestack, extending upwards. Teal and purple mist continuously swirls around the wheels.
